Description: Amulet of the god Duamutef: standing, in relief, facing left. Mummiform human body with jackal's head moulded in opaque black glass, the obverse glossy, the reverse flat and matt. A few incised details on the headdress.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: 'Egyptian Treasures' [exhibition catalogue] (Shanghai 1999), 148-150 No 45; C. Andrews, 'Amulets of Ancient Egypt' (London 1994), p.46.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 2000 / Egyptian Treasures from the British Museum (p.125)
